metadata.synopsis: Dialog file for the Flaming Fist Guard 01 in the Lower City park. Bored dialog before the ambush, worried dialog after the ambush.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Flaming Fist Guard 01 when they aren't in combat.

0.speaker: Fist Bella
0.text: On your way - I can hardly keep watch if I'm talking to you, can I?

1.speaker: Fist Bella
1.text: The captain's the one in charge; take your woes to her.

2.speaker: Fist Bella
2.text: Bloody hells, who were that lot? And the captain - she's dead!
